item.title: Wells Fargo says this restaurant stock is a buy after a sharp pullback
item.description: The firm opened coverage of the stock at overweight.

item.title: Buy this health care stock as it undergoes a 'transformation', Morgan Stanley says
item.description: Investors have an opportunity to buy into Tenet Healthcare right now as the company evolves, according to Morgan Stanley.

item.title: GameStop to invest corporate cash in bitcoin, following in footsteps of MicroStrategy
item.description: GameStop's foray into cryptocurrencies marks the latest effort by CEO Ryan Cohen to revive the struggling brick-and-mortar business.
